blocks.name: clsw
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the Last Symbol of a word.

blocks.name: df-lsw
blocks.content: Extract the last symbol of a word. May be not meaningful for other sets which are not words. The name ` lastS ` (as abbreviation of "lastSymbol") is a compromise between usually used names for corresponding functions in computer programs (as last() or lastChar()), the terminology used for words in set.mm ("symbol" instead of "character") and brevity ("lastS" is shorter than "lastChar" and "lastSymbol"). Labels of theorems about last symbols of a word will contain the abbreviation "lsw" (Last Symbol of a Word). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: lsw
blocks.content: Extract the last symbol of a word. May be not meaningful for other sets which are not words. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsw(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))))
} = {
  sylancl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvex(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, universe, cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), universe, clsw, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))
  fveq12d(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1), c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1, cfv(chash, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, chash)
  df-lsw(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lsw(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(lastS ` c0)=(c0 `((# ` c0)[-]1)))
} = {
  sylancl(c0 ‚àà c1, (lastS ` c0)=(c0 `((# ` c0)[-]1)), c0 ‚àà ùïå, (c0 `((# ` c0)[-]1))‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvex(c0, ((# ` c0)[-]1))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, universe, (c0 `((# ` c0)[-]1)), universe, clsw, (hs0 `((# ` hs0)[-]1)))
  fveq12d(hs0, ((# ` hs0)[-]1), c0, ((# ` c0)[-]1), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  oveq1d((# ` hs0), cmin, nat1, (# ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, chash)
  df-lsw(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 `((# ` c0)[-]1)))
}

blocks.name: lsw0
blocks.content: The last symbol of an empty word does not exist. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Mar-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 2-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm lsw0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wceq(cfv(clsw, c0), emptycls))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(clsw, c0), emptycls, cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))))
  lsw(c0, cword(c1))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), emptycls, cfv(c0, co(nat0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0))
  fvoveq1(cfv(chash, c0), nat0, c0, cmin, nat1)
  3syl(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(nat0, cmin, nat1)), emptycls), wceq(cdm(c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), wn(wcel(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), cdm(c0))))
  wrddm(c0, c1)
  mtbiri(wceq(cdm(c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), cdm(c0)), wcel(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  mto(wcel(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat0, cmin, nat1)))
  mtbir(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat0, cmin, nat1)), wbr(nat1, cle, nat0))
  ax-mp(wn(wbr(nat1, cle, nat0)), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  nnnle0(nat1)
  subge0i(nat0, nat1)
  0re()
  1re()
  elfzole1(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), nat0, cfv(chash, c0))
  eleq2(cdm(c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), co(nat0, cmin, nat1))
  ndmfv(co(nat0, cmin, nat1), c0)
}

blocks.name: lsw0g
blocks.content: The last symbol of an empty word does not exist. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: lsw1
blocks.content: The last symbol of a word of length 1 is the first symbol of this word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: lswcl
blocks.content: Closure of the last symbol: the last symbol of a not empty word belongs to the alphabet for the word. (Contributed by AV, 2-Aug-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 29-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: lswlgt0cl
blocks.content: The last symbol of a nonempty word is element of the alphabet for the word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Oct-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 29-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm lswlgt0cl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), c0))), wcel(cfv(clsw, c1), c2))
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), c0))), wcel(cfv(clsw, c1), c2), wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), c0))
  impcom(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), c0)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), c0)), wcel(c0, cn), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn))
  adantl(wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), c0), wb(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn)))
  eqcoms(cfv(chash, c1), c0, wb(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn)))
  eleq1(c0, cfv(chash, c1), cn)
  adantr(wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), c0), wi(wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  biimpd(wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn), wne(c1, emptycls))
  syl(wcel(c1, cword(c2)), wb(wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn), wne(c1, emptycls)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  wrdfin(c1, c2)
  hashnncl(c1)
  lswcl(c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lswlgt0cl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß(c1 ‚àà Word(c2)‚àß(# ` c1)= c0))‚Üí(lastS ` c1)‚àà c2)
} = {
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß(c1 ‚àà Word(c2)‚àß(# ` c1)= c0)), (lastS ` c1)‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà Word(c2), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  simprl(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c1 ‚àà Word(c2), (# ` c1)= c0)
  impcom(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, (c1 ‚àà Word(c2)‚àß(# ` c1)= c0), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  sylbid((c1 ‚àà Word(c2)‚àß(# ` c1)= c0), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (# ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  adantl(c1 ‚àà Word(c2), (# ` c1)= c0, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Üî(# ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï))
  eqcoms((# ` c1), c0, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Üî(# ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï))
  eleq1(c0, (# ` c1), cn)
  adantr(c1 ‚àà Word(c2), (# ` c1)= c0, ((# ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Üí c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  biimpd(c1 ‚àà Word(c2), (# ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï, c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl(c1 ‚àà Word(c2), ((# ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Üî c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ), c1 ‚àà Fin)
  wrdfin(c1, c2)
  hashnncl(c1)
  lswcl(c1, c2)
}
